response.original_title: 実録!! ほんとにあった恐怖の怨念 2
response.overview: A true record!!! In the series of submitted videos of real-life horrors, each time without fail, they were too horrific and too frightening to explain. We had encountered submitted footage such as the following. The recorded footage picks up the footage in which a particularly terrifying grudge is vividly reflected in the images! There are images of people holding grudges and clinging to this world in a terrifying way.
response.title: Real Record!! Truly Terrifying Resentment 2

titles.title: Jitsuroku!! Honto ni Atta Kyōfu no Onnen 2
